message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thanks for offering!  $120 seems a bit high for me, would you consider $80?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100.
